title: Early-stage performance change of gas diffusion electrodes for CO2 electroreduction to formate
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01347B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Verena Theußl, Henning Weinrich, Fabrizio Lisi, Hermann Tempel, Rüdiger-A. Eichel
Gas diffusion electrodes used for CO2 electroreduction to formate are still inadequate regarding lifetime and stability. Here catalyst agglomeration and loss of hydrophobicity were identified as reasons for early-stage performance changes.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
